_description: The Pride of Life, a morality play — 502 lines in quatrains (abab), ends imperfectly

DublinChrCh.First Lines:
Pees and horkynt hal ifer[Ric] and por yong and
                    hold…
DublinChrCh.Last Lines:
…He wol se his herte blodeAnd he with hym
                    stryveIf…
